name: Little Devils
description:
After centuries of being misjudged for being "devils", a young Tasmanian devil agrees to descend to the depths of hell to restore his ancestors honor.

  • Pick up and play precision platforming
  • Enjoy descending through the 9 circles of hell
  • Collecting Purple Apples provides greater challenge if you desire such things.
  • Meet Satan

The simple controls include double jumping, wall jumping, wall sliding, and various level specific mechanics and hazards. Death is inevitable on this journey, so quick respawns will get you back in the action before you know it.

Can you overcome the perils you encounter as you travel thru hell?
